entry.title: https://github.com/DaoCloud/public-image-mirror
entry.content: 很多镜像都在国外。比如 gcr 。国内下载很慢，需要加速。致力于提供连接全世界的稳定可靠安全的容器镜像服务。

entry.title: https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/azure-devops-docs
entry.content: This repo is the home of the official Azure DevOps documentation for Microsoft. GitHub Issues filed in this repository should be for problems with the documentation.

entry.title: https://github.com/RPi-Distro/pi-gen
entry.content: Tool used to create the official Raspberry Pi OS images

entry.content: pre-commit git hooks to take care of Terraform configurations 🇺🇦

entry.title: https://github.com/awslabs/git-secrets
entry.content: Prevents you from committing secrets and credentials into git repositories

entry.title: https://github.com/docker-mailserver/docker-mailserver
entry.content: Production-ready fullstack but simple mail server (SMTP, IMAP, LDAP, Antispam, Antivirus, etc.) running inside a container.

entry.title: https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz
entry.content: OSS-Fuzz - continuous fuzzing for open source software.

entry.title: https://github.com/termux/termux-packages

entry.title: https://github.com/winapps-org/winapps
entry.content: Run Windows apps such as Microsoft Office/Adobe in Linux (Ubuntu/Fedora) and GNOME/KDE as if they were a part of the native OS, including Nautilus integration. Hard fork of https://github.com/Fmstrat/winapps/

entry.title: https://github.com/yuaotian/go-cursor-help
entry.content: 解决Cursor在免费订阅期间出现以下提示的问题: Your request has been blocked as our system has detected suspicious activity / You've reached your trial request limit. / Too many free trial accounts used on this machine.
